name: Sweeper (MysticDolphin)
description:
Inspired by Minecraft: Java Edition's sweep attack used by a player using a sword. This game is still getting updates

Game's Website - https://sweepergame.weebly.com/

Player 1 Controls:

WASD to move (A and D rotate and not move), E sword sweep

Player 2 Controls:

IJKL to move (J and L rotate and not move), O sword sweep
